name: Eyedentity Dragon Nest Forum Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for Eyedentity's Dragon Nest forum. Also limits signature sizes to something reasonable and allows signatures to have scrollbars for oversize.
additional_info: v0.4.0.092820161214 Fixed sticky topic backgrounds Fixed new comment entry box Donate Known issues: This is still a work in progress, so some items are not restyled properly yet. - User profiles that have customizations make break the dark theme. You'll need to turn off custom user profile pages in the forum settings until I can figure out some sensible defaults for profile pages. - Preview post has dark text on dark background Previous updates v0.3.0.092520161604 Limit signature sizes v0.2.0.092320161904 Darken tabbars Darken Message Center Darken user settings Fix forum list header being unreadable v0.1.1.092320161711 Fix Latest topics being unreadable Fix Search results being unreadable v0.1.0.092320161600 Initial version
